title: Investigation on the Coordination between Methylpyridine Additives with [Cu(dmp)2]2+/+ Redox Couple and Its Improvement to the Stability of the Dye-Sensitized Solar Cells
content:

In dye-sensitized solar cells (DSSCs), the use of copper(II/I) complex redox couples enables a high open-circuit voltage of greater than 1.0 V. However, the widely used electrolyte additive, 4-tert-butylpyridine (TBP),...
